mdRecord.dcterms:title: Gems from the popular opera of Norma: being a collection of the most beautiful airs : complete / arranged for the piano forte .. by J.F. Petri
Bellini, Vincenzo, 1801-1835. Norma. Selections; arr
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Bellini, Vincenzo, 1801-1835 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: "Respectfully dedicated to his pupils Miss Sophia & Rebecca Carroll." [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Thirty-fifth title in a bound volume of sheet music from the library of Mrs. Abby A. Waterhouse, with her name on the cover. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Library's copy has dealer's stamp: Sold by P.H. Taylor, Richmond, Va. [original]
